UK parliament approves legislation on constitutional status of Northern IrelandBritain's parliament voted in favour of revamping Brexit trade rules in Northern Ireland, helping pave the way for the return of the region's power-sharing government for the first time in almost two years. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 14:04:31 GMT 6FQM7C7IKRMXNFUTSMAD3N6GXQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-parliament-approves-legislation-constitutional-status-northern-ireland-2024-02-01/Reuters世界英国
UNRWA could shut down by end of February if funding does not resumeThe United Nations Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA) said on Thursday that it will most likely be forced to shut down its operations in the Middle East, including in Gaza, by the end of the month if funding does not resume. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 14:00:40 GMT QM25AHIVWVIRPNNYGWE3TCEHLU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/unrwa-could-shut-down-by-end-february-if-funding-does-not-resume-2024-02-01/Reuters世界中东
Norway 'reasonably optimistic' funding to UNRWA can get back on trackNorwegian Foreign Minister Espen Barth Eide told Reuters on Thursday he was "reasonably optimistic" some countries that had paused funding to the U.N. agency for Palestinian refugees (UNRWA) would resume payments. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:51:07 GMT PD5LPBYDWVPNDADVG22OJT6EBU https://www.reuters.com/world/norway-reasonously-optimistic-funding-unrwa-can-get-back-track-2024-02-01/Reuters世界
Explainer: Turning back the clock: Germany's AfD and the economyBeyond its anti-immigrant stance, Germany's far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) has an economic platform that would see Germany leave the European Union as it is today and return to a more limited European system of cooperation. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:30:26 GMT T2TE3OUOZBIVNDURZDOSC5AR6A https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/turning-back-clock-germanys-afd-economy-2024-02-01/Maria Martinez世界欧洲
French goat farmer urges consumers to buy local to support sectorBertin Moret, who makes goats' cheese an hour from Paris, has little faith in politicians being able to cut red tape and deter cheap imports as he and other farmers are demanding. For him, salvation must also come from consumers buying French produce. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:24:05 GMT 24O4OFLDPJMJHOFDHSCKPSSTWA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/french-goat-farmer-urges-consumers-buy-local-support-sector-2024-02-01/Noemie Olive世界欧洲
Dutch far-right leader Wilders says 'time pressing' on government formationTen weeks after his resounding win in Dutch elections, far- right leader Geert Wilders said on Thursday that the task of forming a new government was not getting any easier. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:14:44 GMT TXHBBDA7PZKWFGDMMXXWAOLKHY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-far-right-leader-wilders-says-time-pressing-government-formation-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
US lawmakers to press for humanitarian action on MyanmarMembers of the House of Representatives on Thursday will launch the first bipartisan caucus on Myanmar to pressure U.S. administrations to act on the crisis in the Southeast Asian country since the military staged a coup three years ago, according to a statement. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:05:46 GMT KS2VLWW6YZNM3KK4D5QVR3CBCI https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-lawmakers-press-人道主义-action-myanmar-2024-02-01/Simon Lewis世界美国
Austrian prosecutors seek to block rapist Fritzl's move to regular prisonAustrian prosecutors have filed a complaint aimed at overturning a court decision last week that 88-year-old incestuous rapist Josef Fritzl should be moved to regular prison, a court spokesman said on Thursday. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 13:00:15 GMT 4FPFJSGBM5M3HPWLYT2IWXYWSU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/austrian-prosecutors-seek-block-rapist-fritzls-move-regular-prison-2024-02-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Tractor-driving Portuguese farmers block roads to Spain as protests growPortuguese farmers used tractors to block at least three roads linking Portugal to Spain on Thursday, joining Europe-wide protests over a range of grievances, from cheaper imports to insufficient state aid and bureaucracy. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:55:49 GMT KEMA5IH35RMSFOTMI5DELTKV34 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/tractor-driven-portuguese-farmers-block-roads-spain-protests-grow-2024-02-01/Miguel Pereira世界欧洲
EU must step up pressure on Houthis, says Yemen foreign ministerYemen's foreign minister urged the European Union on Thursday to increase pressure on the Iran-aligned Houthis who are attacking commercial ships in the Red Sea, a vital global trade artery. Thu, 01 Feb 2024 12:40:19 GMT DLA2FWRLO5KUJMYWGFQ2BWDLJY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eu-must-step-up-Pressure-houthis-says-yemen-foreign-minister-2024-02-01/Julia Payne世界中东
Hamas unlikely to reject ceasefire but will demand Israeli withdrawal - sourceHamas will not sign a Gaza ceasefire proposal it received from mediators this week without assurances that Israel has committed to ending the war, a Palestinian official close to the talks said.
